net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.util

Class MIWTUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.util.MIWTUtil

  • public class MIWTUtil
extends Object
    Utilities for MIWT. Public use is acceptable.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • gaTrackEvent

        public static <C extends Component> C gaTrackEvent(C component,
                                                   String eventType,
                                                   String category,
                                                   String action,
                                                   @Nullable
                                                   String label,
                                                   @Nullable
                                                   Integer value)
        Add google analytics event tracking attributes.
        Type Parameters:
        C - the type parameter.
        Parameters:
        eventType - event type like "click" or "contextmenu".
        component - the component.
        category - the category. Example: 'Video'.
        action - the action. Example: 'play'.
        label - optional label. Example: 'Fall Campaign'.
        value - optional value.
        Returns:
        the component.

      • getAndSetInputLocale

        public static Locale getAndSetInputLocale(LocalizationInputHelper helper,
                                          Component component)
        Get the input locale from the component or an ancestor. If no input locale is set in the component tree, then set the input locale in the specified component by calling LocalizationInputHelper.getInputLocale().
        Parameters:
        helper - the helper.
        component - the component.
        Returns:
        the input locale.

        public String getColumnModelState(ColumnModel model)
        Get a String representation of the column model state. This primarily includes ordering and visibility.
        Parameters:
        model - the model.
        Returns:
        String, an opaque value, the format is private and should not be manipulated.

      • getMIWTMessage

        public static Message getMIWTMessage(Throwable e)
        Utility function for obtaining an MIWT message from an exception. This function traverses the exception chain for a CmsException and ignores wrapper exceptions like UndeclaredThrowableException and InvocationTargetException.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception.
        Returns:
        the message.

      • getSelectedObject

        @Nullable
public static Object getSelectedObject(ListModelComponent component)
        Convenience method for getting the object that corresponds to the item at getSelectedIndex() in the list model.
        Parameters:
        component - the list model component.
        Returns:
        The selected object from the list model or null if there is no selection.

      • getSelectedObjects

        public static <T> Set<T> getSelectedObjects(ListModelComponent component)
        Get the selection set for the passed component . This will be a modifiable collection composed of the items in the model which are selected.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the elements in the selection set. Clients are responsible for supplying a type that is valid for all potential selected elements in the underlying model. Object should be used if the type of the selected element cannot be known.
        Parameters:
        component - the list model component.
        Returns:
        the selected objects.

      • getSelectedObjectsAsList

        public static <T> List<T> getSelectedObjectsAsList(ListModelComponent component)
        Get the selection list for the passed component . This will be an modifiable collection composed of the items in the model which are selected.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the elements in the selection list. Clients are responsible for supplying a type that is valid for all potential selected elements in the underlying model. Object should be used if the type of the selected element cannot be known.
        Parameters:
        component - the list model component.
        Returns:
        the selected objects.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • inferLabelClassName

        public static void inferLabelClassName(Label label)
        Infer standard label class name(s).
        Parameters:
        label - the label.

      • inferLabelFor

        public static void inferLabelFor(Component... components)
        Infer a label for the specified components. If the the first component is a Label, then the remaining components are searched for a labelable component and Label.setLabelFor(Component) is called. Then inferLabelClassName(Label) is called. If the first component already has a LabelFor property set, then the method returns without making any changes.
        Parameters:
        components - the components. If null, no-op.

      • initHeadingComponent

        public static void initHeadingComponent(Container parent)
        Init the heading component. Container calls from Component#init() . Useful in conjunction with setHeadingComponent(Container, Component).
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent component.

        Load display preferences.
        Parameters:
        columnModelProvider - the column model provider.
        tableDisplay - the table display.

      • removeHeadingComponent

        public static void removeHeadingComponent(Container parent)
        Remove the heading component. Useful in conjunction with setHeadingComponent(Container, Component) when the Containers children are closed, but the heading should be reused.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent component.

      • setColumnModelState

        public void setColumnModelState(ColumnModel model,
                                String state)
        Set the state of the column model (ordering, visibility, etc.) from a value retrieved from getColumnModelState(ColumnModel). This method provides a best-effort approach to setting the state. If some or none of the state can be applied no error condition occurs.
        Parameters:
        model - the model.
        state - the state.

      • setHeadingComponent

        public static <C extends Container> C setHeadingComponent(C parent,
                                                          Component headingComponent)
        Set the heading component. Useful for setting a heading/title. The headingComponent will have its name set, Component.setComponentName(String).
        Type Parameters:
        C - the container type.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent component.
        headingComponent - the heading component. May be null.
        Returns:
        the parent.

      • setSelectedObject

        public static void setSelectedObject(ListModelComponent component,
                                     Object obj)
        Sets the selection to include the passed object if it exists in the component's list. This does not remove other selected objects.
        Parameters:
        component - the component.
        obj - the object
        See Also:
        ListSelectionModel.getLeadSelectionIndex()

      • setSelectedObjects

        public static void setSelectedObjects(ListModelComponent component,
                                      Collection<?> collection)
        Updates the selection to include each of the object in the passed selection. Specifically, this method will add to the selection every element in the list model for which Collection.contains(Object) is true. This operation is additive, NOT exclusive. If you would like to replace the current selection, you must call ListSelectionModel.clearSelection() prior to setting the collection. This method determines selection based on Collection.contains(Object), which will be applied to the collection for every element in the list. Depending on the cost of Collection.contains(Object) and the size of the list model, it may be more performant to call setSelectedObject(ListModelComponent, Object) sequentially for each item in the list.
        Parameters:
        component - the component.
        collection - the collection of objects.
        See Also:
        ListSelectionModel.getLeadSelectionIndex()
